name: Transcendent Automaton
description: After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Blustering Blade, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses Frosty Assault.
descriptionraw: After your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S25012]</color>, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your $[A2501], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S25013]</color>.
descriptionreplaced: After your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blustering Blade</color>, you will switch to your next character. You will switch to your previous character when your Maguu Kenki, who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Frosty Assault</color>.
